com.yolanda.nohttp

接口 BasicClientRequest

  • 所有超级接口:
    Cancelable, Comparable<BasicClientRequest>, Finishable, IPriority, Queueable, SignCancelable, Startable
    所有已知子接口:
    DownloadRequest, ImplClientRequest, Request<T>
    所有已知实现类:
    BasicRequest, ImageRequest, JsonArrayRequest, JsonObjectRequest, RestDownloadRequest, RestRequest, StringRequest

    public interface BasicClientRequest
extends IPriority, Queueable, Startable, Cancelable, SignCancelable, Finishable, Comparable<BasicClientRequest>

    Developers provide data interface.

    Created in Dec 21, 2015 4:17:25 PM.
    作者:
    Yan Zhenjie.

    • 方法详细资料

      • setProxy

        void setProxy(Proxy proxy)
        Set proxy server.
        参数:
        proxy - Can use Proxy proxy = new Proxy(Proxy.Type.HTTP, new InetSocketAddress("64.233.162.83", 80));.

      • setSSLSocketFactory

        void setSSLSocketFactory(SSLSocketFactory socketFactory)
        Sets the SSLSocketFactory for this request.
        参数:
        socketFactory - SSLSocketFactory.

      • setHostnameVerifier

        void setHostnameVerifier(HostnameVerifier hostnameVerifier)
        Set the HostnameVerifier.
        参数:
        hostnameVerifier - HostnameVerifier.

      • setConnectTimeout

        void setConnectTimeout(int connectTimeout)
        Sets the connection timeout time.
        参数:
        connectTimeout - timeout number, Unit is a millisecond.

      • setReadTimeout

        void setReadTimeout(int readTimeout)
        Sets the read timeout time.
        参数:
        readTimeout - timeout number, Unit is a millisecond.

      • addHeader

        void addHeader(String key,
               String value)
        Add a new key-value header.
        参数:
        key - key.
        value - value.

      • addHeader

        void addHeader(HttpCookie cookie)

        Add a HttpCookie.

        Just like the: 
             HttpCookie httpCookie = getHttpCookie();
     if(httpCookie != null)
          request.addHeader("Cookie", cookie.getName() + "=" + cookie.getValue());
     ...
        参数:
        cookie - HttpCookie.

      • setHeader

        void setHeader(String key,
               String value)
        If there is a key to delete, and then add a new key-value header.
        参数:
        key - key.
        value - value.

      • setHeader

        void setHeader(HttpCookie cookie)

        Add a HttpCookie.

        Just like the: 
             HttpCookie httpCookie = getHttpCookie();
     if(httpCookie != null)
          request.setHeader("Cookie", cookie.getName() + "=" + cookie.getValue());
     ...
        参数:
        cookie - HttpCookie.

      • removeHeader

        void removeHeader(String key)
        Remove the key from the information.
        参数:
        key - key.

      • removeAllHeader

        void removeAllHeader()
        Remove all header.

      • setAccept

        void setAccept(String accept)
        Set the accept for head.
        参数:
        accept - such as: "", ".

      • setAcceptLanguage

        void setAcceptLanguage(String acceptLanguage)
        Set the acceptLanguage for head.
        参数:
        acceptLanguage - such as "zh-CN,zh", "en-US,us".

      • setContentType

        void setContentType(String contentType)
        Set the contentType for head.
        参数:
        contentType - such as: "", "" or "". Note, does not need to include quotation marks.

      • setUserAgent

        void setUserAgent(String userAgent)
        Set the userAgent for head.
        参数:
        userAgent - such as: Mozilla/5.0 (Android U; Android 5.0) AppleWebKit/533.1 (KHTML, like Gecko) Version/5.0 Safari/533.1.

      • setParamsEncoding

        void setParamsEncoding(String encoding)
        Set the params encoding.
        参数:
        encoding - such as utf-8, gbk, gb2312.

        Remove all request param.

      • getParamKeyValues

        MultiValueMap<String,Object> getParamKeyValues()
        Get the parameters of key-value pairs.
        返回:
        Not empty Map.

      • setDefineRequestBody

        void setDefineRequestBody(InputStream requestBody,
                          String contentType)
        Settings you want to push data and contentType. Can only accept ByteArrayInputStream and FileInputStream type.

        It is important to note that the request method must be RequestMethod.PUT, RequestMethod.POST, RequestMethod.PATCH in one of them.

        参数:
        requestBody - There can be a file, pictures, any other data flow.You don't need to close it, NoHttp when complete request will be automatically closed.
        contentType - such as: "; charset=", "; charset=" or "". Note, does not need to include quotation marks.
        另请参阅:
        setDefineRequestBody(String, String), setDefineRequestBodyForJson(JSONObject), setDefineRequestBodyForJson(String), setDefineRequestBodyForXML(String)

      • setDefineRequestBody

        void setDefineRequestBody(String requestBody,
                          String contentType)
        Sets the request body and content type.

        It is important to note that the request method must be RequestMethod.PUT, RequestMethod.POST, RequestMethod.PATCH in one of them.

        参数:
        requestBody - string body.
        contentType - such as: "" or "". Note, does not need to include quotation marks.

        If ContentType parameter into "" or null, the default for the .

        另请参阅:
        setDefineRequestBody(InputStream, String), setDefineRequestBodyForJson(JSONObject), setDefineRequestBodyForJson(String), setDefineRequestBodyForXML(String)

      • setDefineRequestBodyForJson

        void setDefineRequestBodyForJson(String jsonBody)
        Set the request json body.

        It is important to note that the request method must be RequestMethod.PUT, RequestMethod.POST, RequestMethod.PATCH in one of them.

        The content type is

        参数:
        jsonBody - json body.
        另请参阅:
        setDefineRequestBody(InputStream, String), setDefineRequestBody(String, String), setDefineRequestBodyForJson(JSONObject), setDefineRequestBodyForXML(String)

      • setDefineRequestBodyForJson

        void setDefineRequestBodyForJson(org.json.JSONObject jsonBody)
        Set the request json body.

        It is important to note that the request method must be RequestMethod.PUT, RequestMethod.POST, RequestMethod.PATCH in one of them.

        The content type is

        参数:
        jsonBody - json body.
        另请参阅:
        setDefineRequestBody(InputStream, String), setDefineRequestBody(String, String), setDefineRequestBodyForJson(String), setDefineRequestBodyForXML(String)

      • setDefineRequestBodyForXML

        void setDefineRequestBodyForXML(String xmlBody)
        Set the request XML body.

        It is important to note that the request method must be RequestMethod.PUT, RequestMethod.POST, RequestMethod.PATCH in one of them.

        The content type is

        参数:
        xmlBody - xml body.
        另请参阅:
        setDefineRequestBody(InputStream, String), setDefineRequestBody(String, String), setDefineRequestBody(String, String), setDefineRequestBodyForJson(String)

      • setRedirectHandler

        void setRedirectHandler(RedirectHandler redirectHandler)
        Sets redirect interface.
        参数:
        redirectHandler - RedirectHandler.

      • setTag

        void setTag(Object tag)
        Set tag of task, At the end of the task is returned to you.
        参数:
        tag - Object.
